tool_description: GroupDocs.Classification Cloud is a REST API for document classification.
name: GroupDocs.Classification Cloud
title: GroupDocs.Classification Cloud

api_list.name: GetSupportedFileFormats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://groupdocs-classification-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/classification/formats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "groupdocs-classification-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
